author: Dylan Phoong
comment: Hope developer add option/function to save customised face. this is a very versatile watch face with tons of customisation. if able to save the colours and settings, things will be very good.

author: Roland Glenn
comment: Running Android Wear 2, works great on my Moto 360, but can't get it to function properly on my Zenwatch 2. Both watches are using Android 6.0 and mobile is running 7. Too bad it doesn't function on the newer watch.

author: Carl Hauck
comment: Very nice watch face.  I like the flexibility in settings.

author: Chris Healy
comment: Love it.
Just about every option you can think of is available. Even ambient mode has options. Only thing I would add is the ability to change the text size.
title: Huge set of customized settings.

author: Thiago Almeida
comment: Falta opção para remover os ponteiros no modo ambiente.

author: Joseph Loria
comment: There are almost too many options in this face, but it's well designed and looks great.
title: Customizable

author: Eric Jackson
comment: First one I've found that actually works 100% and doesn't kill the battery too fast. I can go 4 days between charges with this face!
title: Best watch face I've found!

author: Derek Wilson
comment: Is there anyway to remove the watch hands all together??
title: One request!

author: Cody Schadegg
comment: I like the 'speed one' best, but this face is my number 2
title: Fantastic

author: Andy Mulkeen
comment: Fantastic and very easy to customise. Good job well done with this one
title: Night hawk

author: Leon Washington
comment: Completely customizable and easy to set up. Looks great!
title: Simply Excellent

author: Nik Brooks
comment: I love this watch face looks great and works really well with Google notifications. Very accurate weather and great integration with Google fit. This is in my opinion the best interactive watch face available. Just one request... Please could we have a few more choices with regards to the hands. I would love to be able to change the colour and also have more discrete hands. Although you added thin hands on the most recent update I still think that they still obscure too much of the face.
title: Looks awesome on my Huawei watch

author: Vlad Kolonskyi
comment: But, not sure why full weather details are still in Fahrenheits when I set degrees to be in Celsius.

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
The weather forecast is managed by Google Now. It is directly linked to the language you set in the settings of Google Now. Please try to change the language and the weather unit will be adapted. It is not something related to the watch face itself :)
EDIT: Did it solve your issue?

title: Great watch face

author: S.Kemal Durukan
comment: You won't be disappointed :)
title: Great watch face with a lot of options

author: eric mcdonald
comment: This is a great watch face.I have a few others from this dev.I would give 5 stars but it still needs some work.The weather is not yet that accurate and clicks on the widgets should open up more info.

reply.author: thema
reply.content: An update was released to add more interactivity: You can now get detailed informations by touching the dials, or use system shortcuts! EDIT: dit you get the update?

title: Good

author: dave blanchard
comment: Good watch face but drains watch battery very quick. Normally get 3 days use from 1 charge. Only getting 1 day with this watch face. If sorted will give 5 stars

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Battery usage is linked to the option you use. for exemple, the "full" ambient mode eats a lot more battery than the eco. Heartrate is also heavy for batteries, as it requests the sensors data.

title: Battery

author: Rob R
comment: So far I like it.  It'll give krona sunlight a run for its money on my watch now.
title: So far notbbad

author: M Ashi
comment: Very nice watch face the only thing missing is the ability to make text bigger

author: Ken Parlee
comment: Love the customization and design.
title: Very cool.

author: shreyansh shrey
comment: Superb....loved it

author: siddiq budiutomo
comment: refund immediately

reply.author: thema
reply.content: Hi. Can you send me a wear bug report? I'll be happy to help and solve your issue. If you have any difficulties to get the bug report, please send me an email to thema.apps@gmail.com

title: crash every time in my LG urbane 2nd edition

author: Aboo Zar
comment: Not work on LG Urban

reply.author: thema
reply.content:
Hi. Can you send me detail by email or here about your issue? I am sure I can help you to solve your problem.
EDIT: Did you solve your issue, as I did not get any details?
